name: Kelly Shortridge (@shortridge@hachyderm.io)
summary:
Attached: 1 image

I am so fucking excited to bring #HotNerdSummer to Black Hat next week that I put together this super professional tour poster with all the ways you can experience the resilience revolution next week.

This Barbie is gonna bring a relentless, pastel experience to #BHUSA and I hope you all join me for it.

My talk is on Weds 11:20 - 12:00; follow me to the Q&A after so I can bequeath you a ticket for a *free* copy of my book I’ll sign at the Fastly booth 14:30 - 15:30. 

See you there ✨
